EmailTemplate.name: Lacerte - Nurture2
EmailTemplate.subject: Making the Most of Your Lacerte Evaluation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Hello – Hope you're having a good week. As you explore your Lacerte® Evaluation Software, you can feel confident knowing that we have the information and resources you'll need as a new user. See below for tips and tools designed to help you make the most of Lacerte.
Learn to Use Lacerte Experience a learning path designed for tax professionals who are new to Lacerte or looking to refresh their Lacerte knowledge. Learn how to install and set up your software, watch video tutorials, and ask questions of the Lacerte user community...
5 Ways Lacerte Improves Your Workflow Your business is more than just tax prep – and Intuit® knows that. That's why we have a suite of tools that integrate seamlessly with your Lacerte software to help you manage just about everything, from beginning to end, for your practice...
Have a great day, and of course let me know if you have any questions about Lacerte.
{!User.Name} Lacerte Tax Consultant {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
IMPORTANT: Intuit respects the personal nature of email communication. Every effort is made to offer only information that may be of value to you or your business. If you do not wish to receive marketing email from Intuit in the future, please click here.
If you have any questions or comments, please DO NOT REPLY to this email. Contact Customer Service at 800.765.7777 for assistance. If you receive an email message that appears to come from Intuit but that you suspect is a phishing email, please forward it immediately to spoof@intuit.com. Please visit http://security.intuit.com for additional security information.
® 2012-2013 Intuit Inc. All rights reserved. Intuit, the Intuit logo are trademarks or registered trademarks and/or registered service marks of Intuit Inc. in the United States and other countries. All other marks are the property of their respective owners, should be treated as such, and may be registered in various jurisdictions.
Intuit Inc., Customer Communications, 2800 E. Commerce Center Place, Tucson, AZ 85706
